lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project dialog first)
1. Set up the correct JDK version, as follows:
1. Click `Configure` > `Structure for New Projects` and then `Project Settings` > `Project` > `Project SDK`
1. If JDK 11 is listed in the drop down, select it. If it is not, click `New...` and select the directory where you installed JDK 11
1. Import the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.

1. After the importing is complete, locate the `src/main/java/nekochan.NekoChan.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run nekochan.NekoChan.main()`. If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below:

* @param filePath the file path to store the local save file.
* @param useHistory true if the local save file should be loaded.
* @throws NekoStorageException if the file at the specified {@code filePath} could not be loaded.
public NekoChan(String filePath, boolean useHistory) throws NekoStorageException {

* The {@code Command} class provides a skeletal implementation of an executable command.

public abstract void execute(TaskList list, Storage storage);

assertEquals("[E][\u2718] Description (from 20 Mar 2019 12:00 to 20 Mar 2019 15:30)", event.toString());
Event event = Event.createTask("Description from 20/03/2019 for all day");
assertEquals("[E][\u2718] Description (on 20 Mar 2019 for all day)", event.toString());
Event event = Event.createTask("Description from 1/01/2020 for all day");
assertEquals("[E][\u2718] Description (from 1 Jan 2020 12:00 to 2 Jan 2020 12:00)", event.toString());
assertEquals("[E][\u2718] Description (from 1 Jan 2020 to 2 Jan 2020)", event.toString());
assertEquals("[E][\u2718] Description (on 1 Jan 2020 for all day)", event.toString());
